content.query:
USE PUB_POC_DB;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE  validate_set_tf
(
	ata  VARCHAR(255),
	atd  VARCHAR(255),
	end_lat  VARCHAR(255),
	end_lon  VARCHAR(255),
	end_port  VARCHAR(255),
	end_port_sea_area  VARCHAR(255),
	id  VARCHAR(255),
	in_port  VARCHAR(255),
	lat  VARCHAR(255),
	lon  VARCHAR(255),
	mmsi  VARCHAR(255),
	node  VARCHAR(255),
	speed  VARCHAR(255),
	start_port  VARCHAR(255),
	timestamp  VARCHAR(255),
	vessel_type  VARCHAR(255),
	voyage  VARCHAR(255),
	dq_check  integer,
	final_arrival_diff_minutes  FLOAT(53)
)
WITH(
LOCATION = 'VALIDATE_SET_JSON/',
DATA_SOURCE = PublishDeltaLakeStorage,
FILE_FORMAT = PublishDeltaLakeFormat
);
